sourcesContent:
import regionRoutes from './regionRoutes'
import countryRoutes from './countryRoutes'
import locationRoutes from './locationRoutes'
import departmentRoutes from './departmentRoutes'
import employeeRoutes from './employeeRoutes'
import jobRoutes from './jobRoutes'
import dependentRoutes from './dependentRoutes'
import projectRoutes from './projectRoutes'
import projAssignmentRoutes from './projAssignmentRoutes'

export default {
    regionRoutes,
    countryRoutes,
    locationRoutes,
    departmentRoutes,
    employeeRoutes,
    jobRoutes,
    dependentRoutes,
    projectRoutes,
    projAssignmentRoutes
}

import regionController from './regionController'
import countryController from './countryController'
import locationController from './locationController'
import departmentController from './departmentController'
import employeeController from './employeeController'
import jobController from './jobController'
import dependentController from './dependentController'
import projectController from './projectController'
import projAssignmentController from './projAssignmentController'

export default {
    regionController,
    countryController,
    locationController,
    departmentController,
    employeeController,
    jobController,
    dependentController,
    projectController,
    projAssignmentController
}

const config = {
	env : process.env.NODE_ENV || 'dev',
	port : 3000,
	db_name : 'HR',
	db_username : 'postgres',
	db_password : 'admin'
}
export default config

const config = {
	env : process.env.NODE_ENV || 'dev',
	port : 3000,
	db_name : 'HR',
	db_username : 'postgres',
	db_password : 'admin'
}
export default config

import regionRoutes from './regionRoutes'

    countryRoutes,
    locationRoutes,
    departmentRoutes,
    employeeRoutes,
    jobRoutes,
    dependentRoutes,
    projectRoutes,
    projAssignmentRoutes
}

import regionController from './regionController'
import countryController from './countryController'
import locationController from './locationController'
import departmentController from './departmentController'
import employeeController from './employeeController'
import jobController from './jobController'
import dependentController from './dependentController'
import projectController from './projectController'
import projAssignmentController from './projAssignmentController'

export default {
    regionController,
    countryController,
    locationController,
    departmentController,
    employeeController,
    jobController,
    dependentController,
    projectController,
    projAssignmentController
}
